column4: my existing fedora 11 is already booting with ext4 fs, but uses old grub, how do i tell it to boot ubuntu 9.1 installed in another partition but 9.1 dont have the older stage1 files ?
I think, it will be using stage1 from the other partition, still containing it
the stage1 is specific to the os as far as i know, or maybe its the devicemap thats confusing grub.. i cant remember
